plot: A husband-and-wife team of mystery novelists take a trip on the famed Orient Express hoping for inspiration for their next book. They get mixed up in diamond smuggling and various romantic entanglements.
title: Lujuria en el Oriente Exprés
plot_es: A husband-and-wife team of mystery novelists take a trip on the famed Orient Express hoping for inspiration for their next book. They get mixed up in diamond smuggling and various romantic entanglements.
